data.title: SITRP Number
data.definition: This field is a unique number identifying a specific incident/operation (Record). An E or F in the low-order position indicates the record is for an enemy or friendly initiated incident.

data.title: Corps Zone and Division
data.definition: Corps zone (first character) and ARVN divisional area (last 2 characters) where the incident occurred.

data.title: Province Code
data.definition: Code for the province where the incident occurred.

data.title: Region
data.definition: Viet Cong Military Region where the incident occurred.

data.title: Map Coordinates UTM
data.definition: UTM coordinate location of the incident.

data.title: Lunar Date Month and Day
data.definition: Lunar date when the incident occurred.

data.title: Day of Year, Week, Day of Week
data.definition: Day of year (Julian), week, and the day when the incident started. (DDDWWddd)

data.title: Start Year, Month, Day
data.definition: Year, month, and day when the incident started. (YYMMDD)

data.title: Start Hour, Minute, Month Name
data.definition: Hour and minute and the name of the month when the incident started. (HHMMmmm)

data.title: Completion Year, Month, Day
data.definition: Year, month, and day when the incident terminated. (YYMMDD)

data.title: Completion Hour, Minute, Month Name
data.definition: Hour and minute and the name of the month when the incident terminated. (HHMMmmm)

data.title: Number of Incidents
data.definition: Number which indicates the count of actions if more than one action was initiated during the specific incident.

data.title: Enemy KIA Confirmed
data.definition: Confirmed number of enemy killed during the incident or operation.

data.title: Enemy KIA Estimated
data.definition: Estimated number of enemy killed during the incident or operation.

data.title: Enemy WIA Confirmed
data.definition: Confirmed number of enemy wounded during the incident or operation. Number reflects the count of enemy prisoners that are wounded.

data.title: Enemy WIA Estimated
data.definition: Estimated number of enemy wounded during the incident or operation.

data.title: Enemy POW Confirmed
data.definition: Confirmed number of enemy captured during the incident or operation.

data.title: Enemy POW Suspected
data.definition: Number of persons detained during the incident or operation suspected of being VC/NVA.

data.title: Questionnaire
data.definition: Additional, unformatted information.

data.title: Operation Number and Name
data.definition: Name and number of friendly operation.

data.title: HQ Control Code
data.definition: Code indicates command level in control of the operation.

data.title: Equivalent Battalion Days + Interrogations
data.definition: Equivalent battalion days of operation of the friendly units(s), and the number of interrogations conducted during the operation.

data.title: Friendly KIA Qty
data.definition: Number of friendly personnel killed during the incident.

data.title: Friendly KIA Code
data.definition: Service/category of friendly personnel killed during the incident.

data.title: Friendly WIA Qty
data.definition: The number of friendly personnel wounded during the incident.

data.title: Friendly WIA Code
data.definition: Service/category of friendly personnel wounded during the incident.

data.title: Friendly MIA Qty
data.definition: Number of friendly personnel missing.

data.title: Friendly MIA Code
data.definition: Service/category of friendly personnel missing.

data.title: Friendly MIA Kind Code
data.definition: Code indicates category of MIA.

data.title: Friendly Food Losses
data.definition: Quantity of food lost by the friendly force during the incident.

data.title: Friendly Food Losses Code
data.definition: Code indicates unit of measure and type of food lost by the friendly force.

data.title: Friendly Structure Losses
data.definition: Number of friendly structures lost.

data.title: Friendly Structure Losses Code
data.definition: Code indicates type of friendly structure lost.

data.title: Friendly Radio Losses
data.definition: Number of friendly radios lost.

data.title: Friendly Radio Losses Code
data.definition: Code indicates type of friendly radio lost.

data.title: Friendly Petrol Losses
data.definition: Quantity of POL lost by the friendly force. Number reflects gallons of gasoline lost.

data.title: Friendly Petrol Losses Code
data.definition: There is no units of measure and POL type output table at present. Field is left blank.

data.title: Friendly Drug Losses
data.definition: Quantity of drugs lost by the friendly force.

data.title: Friendly Drug Losses Code
data.definition: There us no units of measure and drug type output table for friendly drug losses at present. Field is left blank.

data.title: Friendly Piaster Losses
data.definition: Vietnamese currency lost by the friendly force, (units of 100 piasters).

data.title: Friendly Vehicle Losses
data.definition: Number of friendly vehicles lost.

data.title: Friendly Vehicle Name
data.definition: Type of friendly vehicle lost.

data.title: Friendly Ammunition Losses
data.definition: Quantity of friendly ammunition lost.

data.title: Friendly Ammunition Losses Code
data.definition: Code indicates type of friendly ammunition lost.

data.title: Friendly Weapon Losses
data.definition: Number of friendly weapons lost.

data.title: Friendly Weapon Losses Code
data.definition: t6_ammunition_weapons_losses.json

data.title: Friendly Weapons Losses Source
data.definition: Country of manufacture of friendly weapons lost.

data.title: Enemy Food Losses
data.definition: Quantity of food lost by the enemy.

data.title: Enemy Food Losses Code
data.definition: Code indicates unit of measure and type of food lost by the enemy.

data.title: Enemy Structure Losses
data.definition: Number of structures lost by the enemy.

data.title: Enemy Structure Losses Code
data.definition: Code indicates type of structure lost by the enemy.

data.title: Enemy Radio Losses
data.definition: Number of radios lost by the enemy.

data.title: Enemy Radio Losses Code
data.definition: Code indicates type of radio lost by the enemy.

data.title: Enemy Petrol Losses
data.definition: Number of gallons of gasoline lost by the enemy.

data.title: Enemy Petrol Losses Code
data.definition: There is no units of measure and POL type output table at present; field is left blank.

data.title: Enemy Drug Losses
data.definition: Quantity of drugs lost by the enemy.

data.title: Enemy Drug Losses Code
data.definition: There is no units of measure and drug type output table for enemy drug losses at present. Field is left blank.

data.title: Enemy Vehicle Losses
data.definition: Number of vehicles lost by the enemy.

data.title: Enemy Vehicle Name
data.definition: Type of vehicles lost by the enemy.

data.title: Enemy Ammunition Losses
data.definition: Quantity of ammunition lost by the enemy.

data.title: Enemy Ammunition
data.definition: Code indicates type of ammunition lost by the enemy.

data.title: Enemy Weapon Losses
data.definition: Number of weapons lost by the enemy.

data.title: Enemy Weapon Losses Code
data.definition: Code indicates type of weapon lost by the enemy.

data.title: Enemy Weapon Losses Source
data.definition: Country of manufacture of weapons lost by the enemy.

data.title: Friendly Unit
data.definition: Service of 1st friendly unit involved in the operation.

data.title: Friendly Branch
data.definition: Branch of 1st friendly unit involved in the operation.

data.title: Friendly Sublevel
data.definition: Sublevel of 1st friendly unit involved in the operation.

data.title: Friendly Level
data.definition: Level of 1st friendly unit in the operation.

data.title: Friendly Unit Number and Battalion Days
data.definition: 1st friendly unit designation and battalion equivalent days of operation. (DDDbbb)

data.title: Friendly Unit
data.definition: Service of 2nd friendly unit involved in the operation.

data.title: Friendly Branch
data.definition: Branch of 2nd friendly unit involved in the operation.

data.title: Friendly Sublevel
data.definition: Sublevel of 2nd friendly unit in the operation.

data.title: Friendly Level
data.definition: Level of 2nd friendly unit in the operation.

data.title: Friendly Unit Number and Battalion Days
data.definition: 2nd friendly unit designation and battalion equivalent days of operation. (DDDbbb)

data.title: Enemy Branch
data.definition: Branch of service of the enemy unit involved in the incident.

data.title: Enemy Sublevel
data.definition: Sublevel of the enemy unit involved in the incident.

data.title: Enemy Level
data.definition: Level of the enemy unit involved in the incident.

data.title: Enemy Unit Number
data.definition: Designation of the enemy unit involved in the incident.

data.title: Friendly Type of Support
data.definition: Code indicates type of support received by the friendly force involved in the incident.

data.title: Friendly Support Unit
data.definition: Code indicates the service of the friendly support unit.

data.title: Friendly Support Branch
data.definition: Code indicates the branch of the friendly support unit.

data.title: Friendly Support Sublevel
data.definition: Sublevel of the friendly support unit.

data.title: Friendly Support Level
data.definition: Code indicates the level of the friendly support unit.

data.title: Friendly Support Unit Number
data.definition: Designation of the friendly support unit.

data.title: Day, Hour Support Requested
data.definition: Day, hour, and minute when support was requested by the friendly force involved in the incident. (DDHHMM)

data.title: Day, Hour Support Received
data.definition: Day, hour, and minute support was received by the friendly force involved in the incident. (DDHHMM)

data.title: Friendly Strength Number
data.definition: Number of friendly units involved in the friendly initiated incident.

data.title: Friendly Strength Type
data.definition: Code indicates the service of the friendly unit involved in the friendly initiated incident.

data.title: Comments
data.definition: Additional, unformatted information.

data.title: Enemy Strength Number
data.definition: Number of enemy units involved in the enemy initiated incident.

data.title: Enemy Strength Type
data.definition: Code indicates the type of enemy unit involved in the enemy initiated incident.

data.title: VC Action Code
data.definition: Code indicates the type of incident (action) initiated by the enemy.

data.title: VC Objective Code
data.definition: Code indicates the objective/target of the enemy initiated action.

data.title: VC Descriptor Code
data.definition: Code describes the activity the friendly element was engaged in at the time of the enemy initiated action.

data.title: Friendly Forces Operation Code
data.definition: Code indicates the type of operation the friendly element was conducting at the time of the friendly initiated incident.
